backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a UI feature update for renaming the music button label to 'For You'.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference.
frontend/.env: Sets the audio source path used by the MusicPlayer component.
frontend/.env.example: Documents optional audio source configuration for the MusicPlayer.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app assembling themed layout with decorative components and primary sections.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Generates animated floating heart icons with randomized positions and timing.
frontend/src/components/FloatingMessages: Creates rotating romantic messages that float horizontally across the screen.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a themed footer with love‑themed text and attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation links and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Intro hero section with greeting, decorations, and a CTA button.
frontend/src/components/LoveLetter.tsx: Displays a styled love letter card with decorative elements and heartfelt text.
frontend/src/components/LoveQuiz.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a love quiz component.
frontend/src/components/Memories.tsx: Displays a grid of themed memory images with captions and hover animations.
frontend/src/components/MusicPlayer.tsx: Implements an audio player with play, mute, volume controls, and a Web Audio fallback tone.
frontend/src/components/Sparkles.tsx: Generates animated sparkle icons positioned randomly across the screen.
frontend/src/components/ValentineProposa: Renders an interactive Valentine prompt with moving 'No' button, confetti, and success animation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identities, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing for frontend-only setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useSmoothScroll.ts: Offers a helper to smoothly scroll to page sections by ID.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles, fonts, CSS variables, and custom animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, content scanning, extended theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state describing a Valentine’s single‑page site, its features, constraints, known issues, and architectural notes for build planning.
